word_mean: 花粉：开花植物的小孢子(雄性受精成分)，许多花粉(特别是空气传播的)是变应原，即它们有蛋白质性的抗原，能使人体致敏，引起变态反应的症状

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin, literally fine powder'

entry.def: Pollen is a fine powder produced by flowers. It fertilizes other flowers of the same species so that they produce seeds.

means.word_mean: 1. the fine spores that contain male gametes and that are borne by an anther in a flowering plant

sentences.en: Hay fever sufferers have a worse time when the pollen count is high.
